name: Openui5-cards
tagline: Google Now like cards for OpenUI5 framework. Delivered as additional OpenUI5 components
body:
openui5-cards Goal
=============

The goal is to provide Google Now like cards for the OpenUI5 framework.
The focus will be on mobile experience.

Overview
=============
The openui5-cards are implemented as custom components to OpenUI5 

The components are currently:
* open.m.CardContainer
* open.m.Card
* open.m.CardActions

CDN reference
* http://elsewhat.github.io/openui5-cards/cdn/0.1/openui5-cards.js
* http://elsewhat.github.io/openui5-cards/cdn/0.1/openui5-cards.css

Ongoing tasks: 
* See Trello task board https://trello.com/b/z64yEaCF/openui5-cards

Examples
===========

Here are some example usages of the openui5-cards component

* Simple - http://elsewhat.github.io/openui5-cards/cdn/0.1/example1.html
* Reddit browser - http://elsewhat.github.io/openui5-cards/cdn/0.1/example2.html
* Google+ browser - http://elsewhat.github.io/openui5-cards/cdn/0.1/example3.html
* Location search - http://elsewhat.github.io/openui5-cards/cdn/0.1/example4.html

Google Now cards
============

See http://elsewhat.github.io/openui5-cards/reference/
(from http://www.google.com/landing/now/#cards)

Elements of cards
============

* Title
* Subtitle
* Address (static map image fetched from Google Maps API based on this)
* open.m.CardActions [0..n]
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
